landing.heroTitle: Create your professional CV in minutes
landing.heroSubtitle: A free, modern, and customizable CV generator. No signup required.
landing.privateDesc: Your data never leaves your browser. Everything is stored locally.

landing.multilingualDesc: Interface available in French, English, and Arabic.

tasks: Designed wireframes and implemented front-end interfaces using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS

truckflow.description: Development of a road fleet management solution:
highlights: Managed vehicles (trucks, trailers), drivers, and trip assignments
Tracked preventive maintenance and fuel consumption, and generated mission orders (PDF)

reservezmoi.description: Development of a multi-sector service booking system:
highlights: Enabled users to book services easily in various sectors (beauty, repair, etc.)
Allowed users to view availability and manage reservations
